rComments: Kristy is wonderful. She's quick and to the point, and, although there seems to be a lot of material, it's very easy to study and you get a lot out of the class. She's easy to approach, accepts tons of emails and holds hellof office hours. take perception!

Kristy is one of the best professors out there! She genuinely cares about her students and their progress! she is really sweet to talk to and is always willing to help! If you can, take a class with her. She is just too great to pass up!

Psych 1 taken at Cabrillo College:                                  For an introductory Psych course, it's not bad. Expect a lecture-heavy format. One area where Kristy is different from most profs. is that she is also an active researcher in animal cognition. Tests are huge but there's a lot of study aid provided online.
